description:
The concepts of this course will work for all versions of Adobe Photoshop as the basic principles remain the same.

Ever heard the saying that sometimes the simplest things can be the best? This can be so true when it comes to Logos & Branding.

If you look at some of the biggest companies on the planet: Google, Yahoo, eBay, they all have simple but high impact text based logos that are super easy to remember.

This course will take you through how to create your own text based Logos that look great & achieve the desired results.

We will use super cool fonts, colours & shapes in order to create Logos that will look great for both print and the web.

Take the course Today and allow us to show you that when it comes to Logos simplicity is usually the best option!
title: Text based Logo Design for Business Using Adobe Photoshop
